name: WishCast
tag_list: ecommerce, online-marketplace, clothing, accessories, shoes, home-decor
overview:
WishCast is online marketplace that allows locally-owned boutiques to make offers on “wishes” that serious shoppers have already expressed interest in buying. Here’s how it works:

1) Consumers create wishes for things they want to buy. 2) Merchants make offers on those wishes. 3) The consumer finds exactly what they’re looking for at a price that makes them smile.

WishCast is committed to giving locally-owned boutiques a platform to connect to serious shoppers. Our merchants represent the best of the best. True A-Listers that sell quality, upscale goods that you can’t find just anywhere.

For now, WishCast is targeting high-margin merchants that sell clothing, shoes, accessories and home decor.

Founded in December 2012 by Adam Prishtina, a Silicon Valley veteran with more than 15 years experience in engineering and product management, WishCast is on track to launch in the spring of 2013.
